target.name: checkcvstag

input.message: Have you tagged the CVS repository (y/n)? The Tag to use is CR_Geometry

target.fail: - ------------------------------------------------------------ You need to tag the repository before publishing the modules and/or resources and/or bo models. Use: CR_Geometry ------------------------------------------------------------

target.name: isomodules
target.description: generate HTML for all modules listed in the publication_index

target.name: publish_isomodules
target.description: Copy HTML for modules listed in publication_index to publication directory

target.name: mergeSMRL
target.description: Merge the published modules and resources into part1000

target.name: isoresdocs
target.description: generate HTML for all listed resource docs

target.name: all
target.depends: normref_check, bibliography_check, modules_check, wgn_summary, publish_isoresdocs, publish_isomodules, zip
target.description: Generate the HTML for ISO publication
